name: Resveratrol - 4 Hour Sustained Release - 500 MG (60 Vegetarian Capsules)
description:
Pro-Longetivity Reservatrol Blend Designed to Support and Help:

  • Activate the SIRT1 'longevity gene'*
  • Provide rapid cell rejuvenation*
  • Offer maximum antioxidant protection*

*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

ingredients.ingredentDetails: WILDCRAFTED JAPANESE KNOTWEED EXTRACT (POLYGONUM CUSPIDATUM)(ROOT & RHIZOME)(STANDARDIZED TO CONTAINA MINIMUM OF 500MG OF TRANS-RESVERATROL), ORGANIC FRENCH WHOLE RED WINE GRAPE (VITIS VINIFERA)(SKIN,SEEDS, FRUIT, STEM, VINE) CERTIFIED ORGANIC MUSCADINE WHOLE RED GRAPE (VITIS RETUNDIFOLA) (SEED & SKIN)

otherIngredients: Vegetarian capsule (vegetable cellulose), rice bran, silica.
directions: As a dietary supplement, take 1 capsule daily. Product may be taken on an empty stomach, with food or as recommended by your healthcare practitioner. Best stored tightly in a cool, dry place.
warnings: Keep out of reach of children and pets. Do not use if outer seal is broken or missing. Please consult your healthcare professional before taking this product if you are pregnant, nursing, on medication or under a doctor's care.
allrgens: Fish Free,Milk Free,Shellfish Free,Soy Free,Tree Nut Free,Wheat Free

228077.text: This seems to be a clean product with a vegetarian capsule. I am on a second bottle. I would recommend this product.
228077.title: Quality Product
228077.name: Al S

228073.text:
Yes ! it works and I highly recommend ! I am 50 and get compliments all the time ! Everyone says I look at least 15 years younger.

I have been taking this for years ! I also take the chews !
228073.title: Resveratrol
228073.name: CHRISTINA R

223947.text: This really helps to keep my memory strong. I’m not calling everyone by the wrong names anymore. I would definitely recommend it.
223947.title: Resverstrol
223947.name: Judy W

117875.text: I USE THIS TO KEEP MY CHOLESTEROL DOWN WITHOUT DRUGS.  IT DOES A GREAT JOB AS LONG AS I EAT A SENSIBLE DIET.  THE DIET ALONE DID NOT WORK.  I ALSO LIKE THE 500MG. BECAUSE I DO NOT LIKE TO TAKE A LOT OF PILLS
117875.title: I GIVE THIS PRODUCT A VERY HIGH RATING.
117875.name: SYLVIA S

117874.text: I'm not done with the first bottle yet and I can already see results (taking 2 caps/day). I'm 39 and look good for my age, but was having issues with crow's feet and this product has helped smooth them out! The only con is the price.
117874.title: It works!
117874.name: Gabriela H G

117877.text: This a Top of the line product- it is not watered down; I love this product!
117877.title: Excellent
117877.name: Bryant C B

117882.text: My husband has been taking this (500 mg) for over a year.  He is 70 yrs. old and now looks like a 50-something! His hair has stopped any new graying and wrinkles are lessening. His complexion has a healthy shine now also.  Tells me that something has been activated!
117882.title: Really works!
117882.name: marilyn w m

117881.text: I'm curious to ascertain why you insist that this produce is not up to organic standards?  Could you explain?
117881.title: A Question for Way Over Priced...""
117881.name: Mark B M

117880.text: This is a topic rarely talked about because people are just too embarassed to bring it up.  However, if you suffer from chronic irregularity, then don't live another day without this product. You will not believe the difference. Thanks Vitamin Shoppe!
117880.title: Great Product
117880.name: Kathy H K

117878.text: Wow, they must be nuts to charge this much. They have the same product with organic grapes at the drug store for $19.99. Also customers should be aware the resveratrol in this product is not organic, very mis-leading.
117878.title: Way over priced
117878.name: A Vitamin Shoppe Customer A

117883.text: I have nothing but the highest esteem for this company, their products are great!
117883.title: Great compani=y
117883.name: Lady O L

117876.text:
This is the first Resveratrol product that I have used. It seems fine however it has a VERY strong taste and is somewhat unpleasant getting it down. I sometimes burp it too but I believe in the benefits and a small price to pay for good health. I've been using this product for 120 consecutive days and can not say that I feel energized or healthier but again, I believe there are long-term benefits.

>> A Vitamin Shoppe Customer commented on this review on 2009-12-04
Did you open the capsule and eat it? Lol
117876.title: Good
117876.name: Christine S C

117873.text: I have tried several brands of Resveratrol and find this Company to be the best. It definitely works and I feel great. I have been taking Resveratrol for years, so I have doubled up from the start and am ecstatic that they now introduced a 500mg product.
117873.title: Brilliant Product""
117873.name: A Vitamin Shoppe Customer A

117879.text:
I have to say that I love this company. I have been using their 250 mg product since march. It worked so well that I started doubling up on the dosage each day and taking 500 mg.

>> A Vitamin Shoppe Customer commented on this review on 2009-08-26
The capsules are huge because this they use lower 50% trans-resveratrol material rather then the more costly 98% material. Resveratrol should not be taken with quercetin. The quercetin blocks the beneficial metabolites of resveratrol.
117879.title: Great Organic Product
117879.name: A Vitamin Shoppe Customer A
